title: Where is the full repair option?
body: My client is broken after trying to update to the beta and the support says to run full repair.  When I click the settings tab the only option shown is for peer to peer transfers??  Where can I access full repair?

replies.body: Thanks guys, yeah I figured out it was hidden in the other menu.

The repair tool on the legacy client should be available on the patcher before the client.  You can download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) instead, though, for a more seemless reinstall.  I hope that helps!
hey, i was having the same problem as you and i think i figured it out... i think you have to click the question mark button instead and click repair from there
